Title: Sabotage
Writer: Joseph Conrad (novel), Charles Bennett (screen play), Ian Hay (dialogue), Helen Simpson (dialogue), Alma Reville (continuity), E.V.H. Emmett (additional dialogue)
Actors: Sylvia Sidney, Oskar Homolka, Desmond Tester, John Loder
Plot: A Scotland Yard undercover detective is on the trail of a saboteur who is part of a plot to set off a bomb in London. But when the detective's cover is blown, the plot begins to unravel.
